name: Rhythm Hell (consistently_nervous)
description:
Play as a burnt out composer trying to end their career with a masterpiece! Shoot, dodge, and try to get the highest score in this single level rhythm, bullet hell mix.

Credits:

Lead Programmer: Bram Johnson

UI/UX and Lead Artist: Lucy Gold

Sound designer: Infinity Bauer

Project Manager: Dillian Pica-Borjas

Player Experience Coordinator: Olivia Catalini
